Content: In order to motivate Commando Regiment (CR) achievers in national / international and para sports competitions as well as to felicitate some of those who have turned disabled having contributed to those victories, a get-together was organized recently in the CR Regimental Headquarters. Brigadier H.H.A.S.P.K Senarathna, Director Plans, Army Headquarters attended the event as the Chief Guest. Retired Commanding Officers, retired Regimental Sergeant Majors, disabled CR soldiers joined the evening.
